value.title: Three Coming Shifts In AI

value.title: MIT Prof Wins $1M Award for Machine Learning-Based Cancer Detection

value.title: Improved OCR and structured data extraction with Amazon Textract
value.excerpt: Optical character recognition (OCR) technology, which enables extracting text from an image, has been around since the mid-20th century, and continues to be a research topic today.
